extendedInfo.description: Seth Mason, a skilled man hunter, has captured Jake Franks, a killer consumed with hatred of all Yankees, after the Civil War.  Seth plans to settle down and use the bounty money to buy a ranch and marry Dinah, who has doubts about the morality of bounty hunting.When Franks kills two lawmen, he escapes to his lover, Red Nel, a half Osage Indian beauty who runs a saloon.  With a deadly showdown with Franks looming, Seth is torn between his goal of ranching, his love for Dinah, and being able to quit bounty hunting after one last manhunt.
